summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating the design of energy systems efficiency for major projects, amending Title 22, Subtitle VII of the Seattle Municipal Code (Seattle Energy Code) to add a new Section 22.700.035; amending Sections 22.702.219, 22.704.060, 22.706, 010, 22.708.010, 22.708.020 and 22.708.060 of the SMC.
